content:
Today I chose PR 7904 for discussion!

feat(order/basic, algebra/ordered_monoid_lemmas topology/uniform_space/{basic + completion): weaken assumptions on monotone
Created by @damiano (@adomani) on 2021-06-12
Labels: help wanted, question, merge-conflict

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Closed because of little benefit and seemingly currently unfixable elaboration issues.
